sentences.en: Despite his outward display of friendliness, I sensed he was concealing something.
sentences.cn: 尽管他表现得友善, 我还是感觉到他有所隐瞒.

sentences.en: He got injured on the outward journey.
sentences.cn: 他外出旅行时受了伤.

sentences.en: His clenched fist was the only outward sign of his anger.
sentences.cn: 他那紧握的拳头是他内心愤怒的唯一外在表现。

sentences.en: Mark was lying unconscious but with no outward sign of injury.
sentences.cn: 马克躺在那儿昏迷不醒，但看不出受伤的迹象。

sentences.en: Normally, such an outward display of affection is reserved for his mother.
sentences.cn: 通常，只有在母亲面前他的情感才会如此外露。

sentences.en: Other poor countries looked outward, strengthening their ties to the economic superpowers.
sentences.cn: 其他的穷国向外看，加强它们和经济大国的联系。

sentences.en: People who sense that they are inferior have to compensate, and often over-compensate by way of outward achievement.
sentences.cn: 觉得自卑的人只有通过外在的成就来弥补自己的不足，但往往都做过了头。

sentences.en: The door opens outward.
sentences.cn: 这扇门向外开.

sentences.en: The economy and outward appearance of the area have changed considerably.
sentences.cn: 该地区的经济和面貌发生了很大的变化。

sentences.en: The material can absorb outward-going radiation from the Earth.
sentences.cn: 该物质可以吸收地球向外辐射的能量。

sentences.en: The medicine is for outward application only.
sentences.cn: 这药只供外用.

sentences.en: the outward flow of oil
sentences.cn: 石油的外流

sentences.en: The ship is outward bound , sailing away from its home port.
sentences.cn: 这艘船是开往外埠的.

sentences.en: The teacher made an outward show of disapproval.
sentences.cn: 老师表面上表示不同意.

sentences.en: The top door opened outward.
sentences.cn: 最上面的门向外开着。

sentences.en: The two ends must be bent outward.
sentences.cn: 两端必须向外弯.

sentences.en: The two things are the same in outward form but different in essence.
sentences.cn: 这两件东西外表形式一样,但实质不同.

sentences.en: The walls of the dilapidated shed lean outward.
sentences.cn: 那座破棚屋的墙向外倾.

sentences.en: Tickets must be bought seven days in advance, with outward and return journey dates specified.
sentences.cn: 购票需提前7天，并确定往返日期。

sentences.en: With all the outward severity he is kind at heart.
sentences.cn: 他虽然外表严厉,但心地和善.

words.tran_cn: 外面的，外部的；远离中心的
最远的；最外面的；最高头的
出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地
远足；短途旅游；体育比赛
外面的,外表的,明显的,可见的,公开的
肉体的,外界的,宇宙的,世间的
外表上,明显地,有名无实地

phrases.tran_cn: 单程旅行；国外旅行；出航

trans.tran_en: relating to how a person or situation seems to be, rather than how it really is
If something moves or faces outward, it moves or faces away from the place you are in or the place you are talking about
